name: Worldclassthemes Notify me Plugin
author: Suhail Ahmad

sections.description:
This plugin can be used to add an email address in addition to existing admin email and will receive an extra email notification whenever a new user is registered. You can install it just by downloading. Its very simple and easy.

Arbitrary section

You may provide arbitrary sections, in the same format as the ones above. This may be of use for extremely complicated
plugins where more information needs to be conveyed that doesn’t fit into the categories of “description” or
“installation.” Arbitrary sections will be shown below the built-in sections outlined above.
sections.faq:
Will this plugin damage my website?

This plugin is free and completely safe.

Where are the menus for adding email address?

You can find “Notify Me” tab in the left menu of wordpress admin panel where you can input the email address or even select the functionality of this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This is version 1.0

1.0.2

  • The icons and fields are updated.
  • Let us know for more additions.

short_description: A secondary notification to receive when a new user registers
